abilities.name: Tactical Instinct
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the **[LETHAL HITS]** ability.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Champion
abilities.rule: The first time this model is destroyed, roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set this model back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with 1 wound remaining.
